long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing news sites post "politically correct" articles, referring to the tireless work of those brave enough to fight for the lives unborn as "anti-abortion" or "anti-choice"? This extension replaces those phrases with more accurate phrase "pro-life".

For more accurate information on the Prolife movemenet, visit www.lifesitenews.com or http://www.lifenews.com/
